ANU.name: Hai Wu
interest: My current research is in the area of financial accounting and capital marketresearch. My past and current research covers some particular topics:determinants of effective financial regulations, information contents of reported innovation activities,determinants and consequences of firms' governance structure, accounting for exploration expenditures;
project: 2. Investment-related pressure and audit risk, with Louise Lu and Yangxin Yu
3. Using the R&D capitalization choice to explain the scale benefits of R&D investment, with Anne-Maree Thomas and Sue Wright
4. Responsive enforcement strategy and corporate compliance with disclosure regulations, with Ka Wai Choi, Xiaomeng Chen and Sue Wright
5. The Impact of Leahy-Smith America Invents Act on firm’s information environment, with Rui Huang and Louise Lu
